original: 安平人，曹魏官員。因與郭太后有故，而被任用，初為人所輕，但清己奉職，漸有美譽。著有《漢書音義》在聲韻、訓詁、考據等小學上有卓著貢獻。可惜此書已亡佚。
text: Anping native, Cao Wei official. Because of a relationship with the Queen Mother Guo, he was appointed. He was initially despised by others, but he gradually gained a reputation as Qing himself. The author of 'Han Shu Yinyi' has made outstanding contributions to elementary schools such as rhyme, exegesis, textual research and so on. It's a pity that this book has been lost.
